info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 25 at 12:17AM CDT until May 27 at 8:20AM CDT by NWS Springfield MO
info.description:
...The National Weather Service in Springfield MO has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Missouri...
Sac River near Caplinger Mills affecting Cedar County.
For the Sac River...including Caplinger Mills...Minor flooding is forecast.
* WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast.
* WHERE...Sac River near Caplinger Mills.
* WHEN...Until Tuesday morning.
* IMPACTS...At 16.0 feet, minor Flooding occurs at the gage site. The campground at Caplinger Mills floods.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 11:45 PM CDT Saturday the stage was 14.7 feet. - Bankfull stage is 16.0 feet. - Forecast...The river will rise above flood stage early this morning to 16.1 feet this morning. It will then fall below flood stage this morning to 14.4 feet this evening. It will rise above flood stage again late tonight to 16.2 feet tomorrow morning. It will then fall below flood stage again tomorrow morning to 10.2 feet early Wednesday morning. It will rise to 10.7 feet early Wednesday afternoon. It will then fall again and remain below flood stage. - Flood stage is 16.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 16.2 feet on 07/13/2019. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction:
Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Many flood deaths occur in vehicles.
Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding.
Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
The next statement will be issued late tonight at 1230 AM CDT.

parameter.value: FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL TUESDAY MORNING
